Summary: Jan 27th Sun 2013,taking pictures of sky around 4:00PM As I saw a Silver Diamond UFO moving over my house.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Charlottesville
There was one other sighting in Charlottesville on or around January 27th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsJan 27th 2013 Sun Around 4:00pm, I was taking pictrues of the sky as I saw what looked to be a Diamond Triangle Silver in color moving over my house heading to the North towards friendship Circle. The size looked to be bigger then a Basketball, about 1 to 2 feet bigger. Also note a jet behind the ufo in the background. P.S. I did a report the night of Jan 27th 2013 and can not find it on your website, So I am reporting it for the 2nd time.
